subject: America's Cup
Sailboats and Sailing
Boats and Boating
lead_paragraph: More than 700 sailors gathered last week at the waterfront home of the New York Yacht Club for the first reunion for crews of the 12-meter yachts used in the America’s Cup from 1958 to 1987.
snippet: More than 700 sailors gathered last week at the waterfront home of the New York Yacht Club for the first reunion for crews of the 12-meter yachts used in the America’s Cup from 1958 to 1987.
